definition[0]: a container for keeping loose papers in, made of folded card or plastic
definition[1]: a group of related documents that you store together on a computer
definition[2]: a cover for keeping loose papers in, made of card or plastic
example[0]: All the correspondence is in this folder.
definition[3]: a place in a computer where a group of related FILEs are stored, usually appearing on the screen as a picture of a folder
example[1]: Most programs automatically create a document folder on the desktop.
